title: Xin Zhao Sated Devourer
body:
Hello Communtiy and Riot-Team,

In my last ranked-game I detected a Xin Zhao bug, as my sated devourer let me knock up an enemy champion with 2 hits instead of 3. I guess its because of the double-proc passive from the devourer. Pls solve this bug cause in addition i dont get the dmg from my 3 q auto.

replies.body: i think complaining is the wrong word, just wanted to report that bug

Are you really complaining about XIN and this DEVOURER shit.... thatÂ´s really sad. Even if it is a bug then they should disable this Devourer shit for a certain time because it is just completely unbalanced. And also there is another bug where you can have unlimited stacks on Devourer shit, discovered with Xin btw.
you do get the damage from the second and third auto at once
na, at least i didnt see any additional dmg and i watched pretty carefully and not only once.
